metadata.title: USN-6203-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: Seokchan Yoon discovered that Django incorrectly handled certain regular expressions. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Django to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6203-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 3:3.2.15-1ubuntu1.4 python-django-doc - 3:3.2.15-1ubuntu1.4 No subscription required
